name: Pillow master
description: This is a game about my imagination and dreams.As a fan of pillow stuffs,I decided to use it as an important element which kind of represent my personalities in the game.As a huge Pixar movies, especially Toy Story series fan,I get the idea of "essential hobbies/stuffs I have in daily life will appear in my dream/nightmare.The nightmare also reflects on the low point of my life, which I eventually overcome it, just like the character.Hope u like & enjoy the game!
